info.title: TON API
info.description: API for interacting with The Open Network (TON) blockchain

get.description: Retrieves a list of NFT transfers from the TON blockchain

parameters.name: direction
parameters.description: The direction of transfers to retrieve

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The maximum number of transfers to return

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The number of transfers to skip before starting to return results

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: The sorting order of the transfers

address.description: The address of the NFT item

value.description: The value of the transfer (if any)
